Mkoa wa Bonde na Range ni mkoa wa upanuzi wa ukoko wa Mashariki-Magharibi. Mkoa huu unaongeza mvutano kwa mstari wa makosa na kusababisha vizuizi vya makosa kutengana. Ukanda wa kusukuma wa Idaho-Wyoming uko kusini mwa kosa la Teton na ni mkoa wa ukoko mnene na ulioharibika ambao unazuia kosa kutoka kwa mbali zaidi kusini. Rocky Mountain Foreland iko mashariki mwa kosa la Teton na ni mkoa wa ukoko mzito. Sehemu hii ya ukoko ni nzito na inaongeza kwa nguvu ya kushuka kwa wima kwenye ukuta wa kosa. Plateau ya Volkeno ya Yellowstone ni mkoa wa kuinua na upanuzi ambao unashawishi vikosi vya wima na vya usawa juu ya kosa la Teton.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Eugene Sternberg
Content: Eugene Sternberg (January 15, 1915 – June 5, 2005) was an Austro-Hungarian born American architect known for his passionate commitment and contribution to contemporary/modernist architecture and town planning in Colorado and other Rocky Mountain states between 1950 and 1990. He designed over 400 building projects and subdivisions, many of them iconic examples of Modernist architecture. Since his focus was on improving the quality of life of the general population, the structures he built were beautiful, useful, and cost-effective. Most of his projects were in the category of social architecture: affordable homes, senior housing projects, public housing, hospitals, medical clinics, public schools, community colleges, community centers, churches, buildings for credit unions, labor unions, and headquarters offices for Rural Electric Associations. As a planner Sternberg designed a number of innovative housing subdivisions and master plans for college campuses, governmental complexes, county fairgrounds, and a number of small western cities.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Eugene Sternberg
Content: Sternberg alizaliwa wakati wa Vita vya Kwanza vya Dunia huko Pressburg, Austria-Hungary ambapo familia yake ilikuwa imehamia kuwa na baba yake wakati yeye alikuwa akihudumu katika jeshi la Austro-Hungary. Wakati vita, na Dola ya Austro-Hungary, ilimalizika mnamo 1918, familia ilirudi nyumbani kwao Munkács (sasa Mukachevo, Ukraine) katika jimbo la Ruthenia; Mnamo 1920 ikawa sehemu ya nchi mpya ya Czechoslovakia.
Wakati wa masomo yake ya msingi na ya shule ya upili. Mapenzi makubwa ya Sternberg yalikuwa sanaa. Alikua msanii mchanga aliyefanikiwa na akashinda mahali pa kutamani kusoma usanifu katika Chuo Kikuu cha Ufundi cha Czech huko Prague. Katika msimu wa joto alifanya kazi kwa mashirika mawili ya usanifu huko Munkács na kwa mbunifu anayejulikana wa Kicheki, Frantisek Libra, huko Prague. Mnamo 1938, alipata digrii ya kwanza katika usanifu/uhandisi. Ujerumani ya Adolf Hitler ilichukua Czechoslovakia mnamo Machi 1939. Kwa sababu Sternberg alipewa usomi katika Chuo Kikuu cha Usanifu cha Bartlett cha London alikuwa na bahati ya kuondoka Czechoslovakia mnamo 1939, mmoja tu wa familia yake kubwa ya Wayahudi kuweza kufanya hivyo.

claim: Fiji is an island nation in the South-West Pacific Ocean, located roughly midway between its nearest neighbours Vanuatu to the west and Tonga to the east
question_en: Where is Fiji located in the world?
report_en: Fiji is an island nation in the South-West Pacific Ocean, located roughly midway between its nearest neighbours Vanuatu to the west and Tonga to the east [1]. The archipelago spreads across longitudes 176° 53′ E to 178° 12′ W, with the 180° meridian slicing through the island of Taveuni; however, the International Date Line bends around the group so the entire country observes the same time zone (UTC+12) [1]. Most of Fiji’s islands lie between latitudes 15° 42′ S and 20° 02′ S, placing them in the tropical southern hemisphere, while the outlying dependency of Rotuma sits farther north at about 12° 30′ S [1].

Title: Timu ya Ligi ya Kitaifa ya Rugby ya Fiji
Content: Fiji alihitimu moja kwa moja Kombe la Dunia la Rugby la 2013 baada ya kushiriki katika mashindano ya 2008. Walichukua 
Australia, England na Ireland katika hatua ya bwawa. Katika mechi yao ya kwanza walichukua 'The Wolfhound'. Walicheza kwenye Uwanja maarufu wa Spotland, huko Rochdale, ambapo Fiji wana ushirika wa kihistoria na. Wa-Fiji walishinda kwa kushawishi kwa alama ya 32-14. Kama inavyotarajiwa Fiji walipoteza kwa Australia na England, ingawa walishangaza wengi, kwani walikubali alama 34 dhidi ya timu hizo kwenye kila mchezo na waliongoza 2-0 dhidi ya Australia, na walikuwa ndani ya dakika chache za kuchukua nusu ya kuongoza dhidi ya England. Fiji angechukua Samoa ya 'Fierce Pacific' Samoa katika robo fainali. Walishinda, Pacific wenye shauku, muundo na wangesherehekea na ushindi wa 22-4. Walisherehekea zaidi, kwani ilimaanisha Fiji walifikia nusu fainali ya pili ya Kombe la Dunia. Walichukua Australia tena, lakini mchezo huu haukuwa kitu kama muundo wa hatua ya kikundi. Makosa ya Fiji yalikubali alama 62 dhidi ya upande wa Australia. Ushindi huu uliisha na kulinganisha kampeni yao bora ya Kombe la Dunia katika historia yao.
---

Walisherehekea zaidi, kwani ilimaanisha Fiji walifikia nusu fainali ya pili ya Kombe la Dunia. Walichukua Australia tena, lakini mchezo huu haukuwa kitu kama muundo wa hatua ya kikundi. Makosa ya Fiji yalikubali alama 62 dhidi ya upande wa Australia. Ushindi huu uliisha na kulinganisha kampeni yao bora ya Kombe la Dunia katika historia yao.

claim: Zombies was first released for Microsoft Windows and OS X on 5 May 2009, launching simultaneously on Steam that same day
question_en: When was the game Plants vs. Zombies released?
report_en: Plants vs. Zombies was first released for Microsoft Windows and OS X on 5 May 2009, launching simultaneously on Steam that same day [1]. Subsequent ports followed: iOS in February 2010, an Xbox Live Arcade version with extra modes on 8 September 2010, Nintendo DS on 18 January 2011, PlayStation 3 in February 2011, Android via Amazon Appstore on 31 May 2011 and on Google Play on 14 December 2011, BlackBerry PlayBook on 16 February 2012, and BlackBerry 10 smartphones in January 2013; the original PC/Mac edition was also re-released as a “Game of the Year” version, and a free ad-supported iOS edition appeared in January 2015 [1].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Plants vs. Zombies
Content: Plants vs. Zombies is a tower defense video game developed and originally published by PopCap Games for Microsoft Windows and OS X. The game involves homeowners who use a variety of different plants to prevent an army of zombies from entering their houses and "eating their brains". It was first released on May 5, 2009, and made available on Steam on the same day. A version for iOS was released in February 2010, and an HD version for the iPad. An extended Xbox Live Arcade version introducing new gameplay modes and features was released on September 8, 2010. PopCap released a Nintendo DS version on January 18, 2011 with content unique to the platform. The PlayStation 3 version was released in February 2011 also with added new co-op and versus modes found in the Xbox 360 version. An Android version of the game was released on May 31, 2011 on the Amazon Appstore, while it was also released to the Android Market (now Google Play) on December 14, 2011. On February 16, 2012, a version was released for BlackBerry PlayBook. Later, a BlackBerry smartphone version of the game was released on January 2013 following the launch of BlackBerry 10. Furthermore, both the original Windows and Mac version of the game have been re-released with additional content in a "Game of the Year" version. In January 2015, a free ad-supported version of the game was released for iOS.
---

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Paavo Berglund
Content: According to the Finnish Broadcasting Company YLE, Berglund's Stradivarius violin was sold by his heirs in 2012 to the Finnish Cultural Foundation for 1.8 million euros. At the same time the performing artist's rights to Berglund's recordings as well as his valuable collection of orchestral sheet music were donated to the foundation. The latter material will be made available to researchers in ten years' time. The violin will be named Stradivarius ex. Berglund. Mr Berglund's son Juha Berglund, the spokesperson for the family, says that his father had several instruments, but the Stradivari was the dearest to him. Mr Berglund's specific wish was that the violin should stay in Finland. The violin was built in around 1700. The violin is in exceptionally good condition for its age.

Document ID: 2
Title: Henri Temianka
Content: Katika vijana wake Temianka alicheza Laurentius Storioni ya 1780. Wakati akisafiri chini ya Aegis ya Taasisi ya Curtis, alicheza kwa kifupi Stradivarius, ambayo ilibadilishwa kwa Januarius Gagliano. Mnamo 1929 Temianka alimiliki violin iliyotengenezwa mnamo 1752 na Joannes Baptista Guadagnini. Mnamo miaka ya 1930 alicheza violin ya silvestre, ambayo alifanya rekodi zake za mapema za zabibu, na baadaye Januarius Gagliano na Carlo Bergonzi.
Stradivarius aliyocheza wakati wa miaka ya Paganini Quartet alikuwa "Comte Cozio di Salabue" ya 1727, ambayo ilikuwa tamasha la Paganini mwenyewe. Baadaye ilichezwa na Martin Beaver, mtawala wa kwanza wa Tokyo String Quartet, ambayo ilicheza tangu 1995 kwenye quartet ile ile ya vifaa vya Stradivarius ambavyo vilikuwa vya Paganini, hadi Tokyo String Quartet alistaafu mnamo Julai 2013. Vyombo hivi vya kushangaza - Harld pia alimchochea Paganie "" " Quartet kwa karibu miaka 15, kuanzia 1982, na kwa sasa inamilikiwa na Nippon Music Foundation ya Japan, baada ya Deacquisition na Jumba la sanaa la Corcoran katikati ya miaka ya 1990 kwa $ 15 milioni. Walichezwa kwa miaka kadhaa na Hagen Quartet, na sasa wako mikononi mwa Quartetto di Cremona.
Wakati miaka ya quartet ya Paganini ilipomalizika, Temianka alicheza Michelangelo Bergonzi ya 1759. Rekodi zake za Handel Sonatas zilitengenezwa kwenye Andrea Guarneri ya 1687.Katika Februari 2013, Chuo Kikuu cha Chapman kililipa udhamini wa Henri Temianka katika masomo ya muziki na masomo. Violin iliyochezwa na Albert Saparoff, Concertmaster wa Hollywood Symphony, ilipewa kama Temianka-Saparoff Violin, na imejitolea kwa matumizi ya mpokeaji aliyechaguliwa wakati wa kusoma hapo.

Swanton alipendekeza kwamba Choctaw alipata jina lao kutoka kwa kiongozi wa mapema. claim: Jewish people first arrived in England in significant numbers in 1066, accompanying William the Conqueror after his Norman invasion and establishment of rule over the country
question_en: When did Jewish people first come to England?
report_en: Jewish people first arrived in England in significant numbers in 1066, accompanying William the Conqueror after his Norman invasion and establishment of rule over the country [1].
all_claims: Jewish people first arrived in England in significant numbers in 1066, accompanying William the Conqueror after his Norman invasion and establishment of rule over the country [1].
claims_retained: Jewish people first arrived in England in significant numbers in 1066, accompanying William the Conqueror after his Norman invasion and establishment of rule over the country [1].
prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Edict of Expulsion
Content: The first Jewish communities of significant size came to England with William the Conqueror in 1066. After the conquest of England, William instituted a feudal system in the country, whereby all estates formally belonged to the Crown; the king then appointed lords over these vast estates, but they were subject to duties and obligations (financial and military) to the king. Under the lords were other subjects such as serfs, who were bound and obliged to their lords, and to their lords' obligations. Merchants had a special status in the system, as did Jews. Jews were declared to be direct subjects of the king, unlike the rest of the population. This was an ambivalent legal position for the Jewish population, in that they were not tied to any particular lord but were subject to the whims of the king, it could be either advantageous or disadvantageous. Every successive king formally reviewed a royal charter, granting Jews the right to remain in England. Jews did not enjoy any of the guarantees of the Magna Carta of 1215.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Historia ya Wayahudi huko England
Content: Wayahudi wa Kiingereza walipata "umri wa dhahabu" wa aina chini ya Henry II mwishoni mwa karne ya 12 kwa sababu ya upanuzi mkubwa wa kiuchumi na kuongezeka kwa mahitaji ya mkopo. Bahati kubwa za Kiyahudi zilitengenezwa London, Oxford, Lincoln, Bristol, na Norwich. Taji, kwa upande wake, ilipewa ustawi wa Wayahudi wake. Mbali na ushuru mwingi wa kiholela, Richard I alianzisha agizo la Uyahudi mnamo 1194 katika jaribio la kuandaa Jumuiya ya Wayahudi. Ilihakikisha kuwa rekodi za lazima zitahifadhiwa na maafisa wa kifalme kwa shughuli zote za Kiyahudi. Kila deni lilirekodiwa kwenye chirografia ili kumruhusu Mfalme mara moja na ufikiaji kamili wa mali ya Kiyahudi. Richard pia alianzisha exchequer maalum kukusanya deni yoyote isiyolipwa baada ya kifo cha mkopeshaji wa Kiyahudi. Uanzishwaji wa exchequer ya Wayahudi mwishowe ulifanya shughuli zote za Uyahudi wa Kiingereza kuwajibika kwa ushuru na mfalme kwa kuongeza 10% ya hesabu zote zilizopatikana na Wayahudi kwa msaada wa mahakama za Kiingereza. Kwa hivyo, wakati vita vya kwanza na vya pili viliongezea hisia za kupinga-Wayahudi, Wayahudi huko England walikwenda bila shida zaidi ya faini ya mara kwa mara na ushuru maalum. Ingawa hawakupata uzoefu huo wa uhamaji wa kijamii na maendeleo ya kitamaduni ambayo Wayahudi chini ya utawala wa Waislamu walifanya, Wayahudi wa idadi ya watu wa England na ustawi waliongezeka chini ya ulinzi wa mfalme.

Title: Monarchies in Europe
Content: Spain came into existence as a single, united kingdom under Charles I of Spain on 23 January 1516. The monarchy was briefly abolished by the First Spanish Republic from 11 February 1873 until 29 December 1874. The monarchy was abolished again on 14 April 1931, first by the Second Spanish Republic – which lasted until 1 April 1939 – and subsequently by the dictatorship of Francisco Franco, who ruled until his death on 20 November 1975. Monarchy was restored on 22 November 1975 under Juan Carlos I, who was also the monarch until his abdication in 2014. His son Felipe VI is the current monarch. 
The 1978 constitution confirms the title of the monarch is the "King of Spain", but that he may also use other titles historically associated with the Crown,
including the kingdoms of Castile and León, Aragon, the Two Sicilies, Jerusalem, Navarre, Granada, Seville, Toledo, Valencia, Galicia, Sardinia, Córdoba, Corsica, etc.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Bill of Rights 1689
Content: The Bill of Rights, also known as the English Bill of Rights, is an Act of the Parliament of England that sets out certain basic civil rights and clarifies who would be next to inherit the Crown. It received the Royal Assent on 16 December 1689 and is a restatement in statutory form of the Declaration of Right presented by the Convention Parliament to William III and Mary II in February 1689, inviting them to become joint sovereigns of England. The Bill of Rights lays down limits on the powers of the monarch and sets out the rights of Parliament, including the requirement for regular parliaments, free elections, and freedom of speech in Parliament. It sets out certain rights of individuals including the prohibition of cruel and unusual punishment and reestablished the right of Protestants to have arms for their defence within the rule of law. Furthermore, the Bill of Rights described and condemned several misdeeds of James II of England.

Dhana zilizowekwa katika marekebisho haya zimejengwa juu ya zile zilizopatikana katika hati kadhaa za mapema, pamoja na Azimio la Haki za Virginia na Muswada wa Haki za Kiingereza, pamoja na hati za mapema kama Magna Carta (1215). Alikua katika kitongoji tajiri cha Chicago cha Msitu wa Ziwa na alihudhuria Chuo cha Msitu wa Ziwa, Phillips Exeter Academy huko Exeter, New Hampshire, na Chuo Kikuu cha Princeton. Title: Zhou Enlai
Content: Soon after birth, Zhou Enlai was adopted by his father's youngest brother, Zhou Yigan, who was ill with tuberculosis. Apparently the adoption was arranged because the family feared Yigan would die without an heir. Zhou Yigan died soon after the adoption, and Zhou Enlai was raised by Yigan's widow, whose surname was Chen. Madame Chen was also from a scholarly family and received a traditional literary education. According to Zhou's own account, he was very close to his adoptive mother and acquired his lasting interest in Chinese literature and opera from her. Madame Chen taught Zhou to read and write at an early age, and Zhou later claimed to have read the famous vernacular novel "Journey to the West" at the age of six. By the age of eight, he was reading other traditional Chinese novels, including "the Water Margin", "Romance of the Three Kingdoms", and "Dream of the Red Chamber".

Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Julius Caesar Chappelle
Content: Julius Caesar Chappelle (1852–1904) was an African-American politician born into slavery in South Carolina. After the American Civil War, he lived for a time with his family in LaVilla, Florida, helping develop the new town. In 1870, he was one of numerous Southern black migrants to Boston, Massachusetts, which had a thriving black community and strong abolitionist history. He later joined the Republican Party that was founded by abolitionists, and Chappelle was elected to two terms in the Massachusetts state legislature, serving 1883-1886. Julius Caesar Chappelle was also the first African-American to serve on the Massachusetts State Senate Committee where he served three terms. Chappelle was active in supporting civil rights, trying to reduce discrimination, and consumer affairs. His speeches were frequently covered by newspapers. Throughout his life and political career, he held secondary supervisory government positions in maintenance, such as at the United States Post Office and US Boston Custom House. Although Julius Caesar Chappelle may have graced the same pages in newspapers as Frederick Douglass, Chappelle is not as well known because he is not known to have left much of a literary footprint such as writing manuscripts or for pamphlets.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Montana Vigilantes
Content: The history of vigilante justice and the Montana Vigilantes began in 1863 in what was at the time a remote part of eastern Idaho Territory. Vigilante activities continued, although somewhat sporadically, through the Montana Territorial period until the territory became the state of Montana on November 8, 1889. Vigilantism arose because territorial law enforcement and the courts had very little power in the remote mining camps during the territorial period.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Montana Vigilantes
Content: Akaunti ya kwanza iliyoandikwa ya The Vigilantes ilikuwa "Vigilantes ya Montana" ambayo ilionekana kama safu ya makala katika matoleo ya 1865 ya "Montana Post", gazeti la kwanza la Virginia City na Montana. Dimsdale alikuwa mwanachama wa Kamati ya Uangalizi ya Alder Gulch na mhariri wa "Montana Post." Akaunti zake za mapema za hafla za Alder Gulch Vigilante zimetajwa sana na toleo la kitabu cha nakala zake, kitabu cha kwanza kilichochapishwa katika eneo la Montana mnamo 1866, kimechapishwa sana tangu toleo lake la kwanza. X. Biedler, mmoja wa Alder Gulch na Helena Vigilante Enforcers aliandika juu ya shughuli zake za macho katika majarida yake ya kibinafsi. Hawakupatikana hadi baada ya kifo chake wakati Helen F. Sanders, binti-mkwe wa Wilbur Sanders hatimaye alipochapishwa mnamo 1957. Nathaniel Langford, pia mwanachama wa Vigilantes, Explorer wa Upper Yellowstone (1870), Msimamizi wa kwanza wa Hifadhi ya Kitaifa ya Yellowstone (1872-1877). "Siku za Vigilante na Njia za Waanzilishi wa Rockies" mnamo 1893 baada ya kurudi nyumbani kwake Minnesota. Katika hotuba ya 1912 kwa Jumuiya ya Kihistoria ya Montana, mwanahistoria wa Magharibi, Olin Wheeler alitoa maoni mazuri juu ya Alder Gulch Vigilantes katika ushuru wa maisha ya Nathaniel Langford. Akaunti nyingine, ambayo haijachapishwa hadi 1982, ni ile ya Jaji wa zamani wa Mahakama Kuu ya Montana (1922-1935) Lew L. Callaway. Ilihaririwa na mtoto wake Lew Callaway Jr., "Haki ya Haki ya Montana: Vigilantes in Action" inatokana na ushirika wa Callaway na Nahodha wa Vigilante James William mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1800. Lew Callaway aliandika sana juu ya Vigilantes na hadithi zake ambazo zinaongeza maelezo ya karibu zaidi juu ya jinsi vigilantes inavyofanya kazi hutekwa kwa kiasi hiki. Ingawa shughuli zingine za macho katika kipindi hiki zilikosolewa na raia na viongozi wa raia, kulikuwa na uthibitisho wa jumla wa kusudi lao na mchango kwa sheria na utaratibu katika eneo linalokua. Alama C. "Montana Vigilantes 1863-1870 dhahabu, bunduki na gallows" (2013) anahitimisha kwamba ilitoa mazingira yasiyokuwa na sheria na shughuli za uhalifu huko Alder Gulch na Helena wakati huo, ukosefu wa mfumo wowote wa haki na uelewa wa mchakato unaofaa wakati huo, Vigilantes walitenda kwa njia walidhani bora kwa mawasiliano yao. Anasema kwamba kuhukumu macho kwa uelewa wa leo na viwango vya mchakato unaofaa ni shida. Mnamo 2004, Frederick Allen, mwandishi wa habari na mwanahistoria, alichapisha "heshima na mpangilio mzuri: Montana Vigilantes" ilipitiwa kama akaunti ya siku ya usawa ya historia ya Montana ya Vigilante (1864-1870). Kitabu cha Allen kinasisitiza motisha na njia za waangalifu wa mapema huko Alder Gulch wakati wa kutoa maoni juu ya udhalilishaji unaokua wa umakini wa miaka ya 1860. Jenerali zaidi anafanya kazi kwenye historia ya Montana kama vile Merrill G. Burlingame's "Montana Frontier" (1942) na Michael P. Malone's "Historia ya Montana-A ya karne mbili" (1991) inafupisha kwa muhtasari kipindi cha Vigilante kwa msingi wa akaunti za Dimsdale, Langford na Biedler. Kwa kuongezea, historia nyingi za juu za Montana, kama vile mwandishi wa riwaya na mwanahistoria wa Montana Dan Cushman's "Montana: The Gold Frontier" (1973) hushughulikia kipindi cha Vigilante.

claim: Whole cow’s milk is explicitly described as having “too much protein” for infants, while the protein in breast milk is more appropriate for their needs
question_en: Does human breast milk have higher protein than cow milk?
report_en: No; human breast milk contains less protein than cow’s milk. Whole cow’s milk is explicitly described as having “too much protein” for infants, while the protein in breast milk is more appropriate for their needs [1]. Typical compositions reflect this difference: cow’s milk averages about 3–3.5 g of protein per 100 mL, whereas mature human milk provides roughly 0.9–1.2 g per 100 mL, meaning cow’s milk has about three times the protein concentration.

Title: Breast milk
Content: Whole cow's milk contains too little iron, retinol, vitamin E, vitamin C, vitamin D, unsaturated fats or essential fatty acids for human babies. Whole cow's milk also contains too much protein, sodium, potassium, phosphorus and chloride which may put a strain on an infant's immature kidneys. In addition, the proteins, fats and calcium in whole cow's milk are more difficult for an infant to digest and absorb than the ones in breast milk. Evaporated milk may be easier to digest due to the processing of the protein but is still nutritionally inadequate. Some infants are allergic to cow's milk protein, this problem may be associated with infant formulas derived from cow's milk.

claim: Greed—defined as an intense desire for more—can sometimes promote beneficial outcomes because the pursuit of personal gain often spurs risk-taking, efficiency improvements, and innovation that raise overall wealth; proponents such as financier Ivan Boesky argued in a 1986 Berkeley commencement address that “greed is healthy” and compatible with self-respect, a stance dramatized by Gordon Gekko’s “greed is good” speech in the 1987 film “Wall Street,” which claims greed “clarifies, cuts through, and captures the essence of the evolutionary spirit”
question_en: Can greed be a good thing?
report_en: Greed—defined as an intense desire for more—can sometimes promote beneficial outcomes because the pursuit of personal gain often spurs risk-taking, efficiency improvements, and innovation that raise overall wealth; proponents such as financier Ivan Boesky argued in a 1986 Berkeley commencement address that “greed is healthy” and compatible with self-respect, a stance dramatized by Gordon Gekko’s “greed is good” speech in the 1987 film “Wall Street,” which claims greed “clarifies, cuts through, and captures the essence of the evolutionary spirit” [1]. By motivating individuals to work harder, invest, and compete, greed can increase productivity and expand markets, much as Adam Smith’s “invisible hand” describes self-interest unintentionally benefiting society. However, when unchecked by regulation or ethical norms, greed can also fuel fraud, inequality, and systemic risk—Boesky himself was later jailed for insider trading—so the key question is not whether greed can ever be good, but whether institutions channel it toward socially constructive ends while limiting its destructive potential.

question_en: Is Hepatitis contagious?
report_en: Yes—Hepatitis B is a contagious virus that infects the liver and can spread from an infected person to others, manifesting as either a short-term acute illness or a long-term chronic condition [1]. Because the virus is readily transmissible at birth, about 90 % of infants who acquire it develop chronic infection, whereas the risk decreases as children get older [1]. Since the vaccine became routine for U.S. children in 1990, rates of acute Hepatitis B have fallen by 82 %, demonstrating both the virus’s prior ease of transmission and the effectiveness of immunization in curbing its spread [1].

Two different types of infection exist for this disease, "acute" and "chronic." Acute Hepatitis B is a short term illness that occurs within 6 months of exposure, Chronic Hepatitis B is long term and happens when the virus remains in the body.
The younger the child is, the greater their chance of developing a chronic infection and this risk goes down as the child gets older. Approximately 90% of infected infants will develop a chronic infection. 
Since 1990, when the vaccine was introduced as a routine vaccination in children, rates of acute Hepatitis B has decreased in the United States by 82%. This vaccine is given as a series of shots, the first dose is given at birth, the second between 1 and 2 months, and the third, and possibly fourth, between 6 and 18 months.

Since 1982, when the vaccine became available, more than 100 million people have received the vaccine in the United States and no serious side effects have been reported.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Earth's magnetic field
Content: Earth's magnetic field, also known as the geomagnetic field, is the magnetic field that extends from the Earth's interior out into space, where it meets the solar wind, a stream of charged particles emanating from the Sun. Its magnitude at the Earth's surface ranges from 25 to 65 microteslas (0.25 to 0.65 gauss). Approximately, it is the field of a magnetic dipole currently tilted at an angle of about 11 degrees with respect to Earth's rotational axis, as if there were a bar magnet placed at that angle at the center of the Earth. The North geomagnetic pole, located near Greenland in the northern hemisphere, is actually the south pole of the Earth's magnetic field, and the South geomagnetic pole is the north pole. The magnetic field is generated by electric currents due to the motion of convection currents of molten iron in the Earth's outer core driven by heat escaping from the core, a natural process called a geodynamo.
---

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Omnivore
Content: Various mammals are omnivorous in the wild, such as species of pigs, badgers, bears, coatis, civets, hedgehogs, opossums, skunks, sloths, squirrels, raccoons, chipmunks, mice, and rats. Hominidae, including humans and chimpanzees, are also omnivores.
Most bear species are omnivores, but individual diets can range from almost exclusively herbivorous to almost exclusively carnivorous, depending on what food sources are available locally and seasonally. Polar bears are classified as carnivores, both taxonomically (they are in the order Carnivora), and behaviorally (they subsist on a largely carnivorous diet). Depending on the species of bear, there is generally a preference for one class of food, as plants and animals are digested differently. Wolf subspecies (including wolves, dogs, dingoes, and coyotes) eat some plant matter, but they have a general preference and are evolutionarily geared towards meat. Also, the maned wolf is a canid whose diet is naturally 50% plant matter.

Kwa kulinganisha, uwepo wa mabaki hayo machache ya carnivore yanaweza kuelezewa kama matokeo ya matumizi ya binadamu kwa hivyo hufanyika na mabaki ya sungura ("Oryctolagus cuniculus").

Content: People have been using natural organic polymers for centuries in the form of waxes and shellac, which is classified as a thermoplastic polymer. A plant polymer named cellulose provided the tensile strength for natural fibers and ropes, and by the early 19th century natural rubber was in widespread use. Polymers are the raw materials (the resins) used to make what are commonly called plastics. Plastics are the final product, created after one or more polymers or additives have been added to a resin during processing, which is then shaped into a final form. Polymers that have been around, and that are in current widespread use, include carbon-based polyethylene, polypropylene, polyvinyl chloride, polystyrene, nylons, polyesters, acrylics, polyurethane, and polycarbonates, and silicon-based silicones. Plastics are generally classified as "commodity", "specialty" and "engineering" plastics.

Mwanzoni, kuchukua DNA au RNA kama templeti, wanasayansi waliendeleza safu ya polima ya peptide (PNA), bila kutumia polymerases za DNA. Lakini njia hii ni mdogo kwa kiwango cha upolimishaji na mavuno. Baada ya hapo, athari ya mnyororo wa polymerase (PCR) imeandaliwa, ambayo kwa sasa bado ndiyo njia inayotumika sana ya mlolongo. Siku hizi, umakini zaidi hulipwa kwa utumiaji wa ribosomes ili kuiga moja kwa moja mchakato wa maandishi na tafsiri. Teknolojia hii inayoitwa uhandisi wa proteni inachukuliwa kama njia ya kuahidi ya polymerization ya biolojia kwa mchanganyiko wa polima zinazodhibitiwa na mlolongo.

Title: Michael Bruxner
Content: Lieutenant Colonel Sir Michael Frederick Bruxner (25 March 1882 – 28 March 1970) was an Australian politician and soldier, serving for many years as Leader of the Country Party and its predecessors. Born in Tabulum in Northern New South Wales, Bruxner was educated at The Armidale School and started studies at University of Sydney but later dropped out to take up employment as a grazier and station agent in Tenterfield. After serving in the Citizen Military Forces from 1911, Bruxner enlisted into the Australian Light Horse upon the outbreak of the First World War in 1914. Serving with distinction in Gallipoli, Egypt and Palestine, he was promoted to lieutenant colonel and awarded the Distinguished Service Order.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Streets of Albany, New York
Content: Swallow Street (whose name was Gage prior to 1790) was one of the few bird streets whose name was not kept, its name being changed to Knox Street in 1809. Knox Street would stretch north from Myrtle Avenue to Clinton Avenue, and eventually to Livingston Avenue. In 1896 Northern Boulevard was built from that intersection of Knox and Livingston north to Van Rensselaer Boulevard, including a 653-foot-long bridge over Tivoli Hollow and the New York Central Railroad's tracks, a modern bridge still carries Northern Boulevard at that location. In 1898 a 759-foot-long bridge was built to carry Knox from Central Avenue over Sheridan Hollow to Sheridan Avenue, and again a modern bridge is there today. When Washington Park was being created, Knox Street between Madison Ave and State Street was purchased in 1880 and all buildings were removed. Knox Street in the park is now a pedestrian mall, called the Knox Street Mall; it is the only straight path in the park. Later, Knox Street from State to Livingston would be changed to Northern Boulevard to match the street it met up with, this left the name Knox Street as only the three blocks between Myrtle and Madison in the Park South neighborhood. In 1991 Northern Boulevard from Livingston to State along with its extension within Washington Park to Madison Avenue at Willett Street was renamed Henry Johnson Boulevard in honor of an African-American World War I hero. The name Northern Boulevard remains from Livingston to Van Rensselaer Boulevard.

Njia hiyo inapita nyuma ya nyumba mbili kabla ya kuacha mipaka ya jiji la Albany na kuwa ya kutunzwa wakati inavuka katika mji wa Colonie na kijiji chake cha Menands. Ndani ya Menands, NY 377 hupitia maili nyingine (1.6 km) ya trakti za makazi kabla ya kumalizika kwenye makutano na NY 378 (barabara ya Menand) kaskazini magharibi mwa kituo cha kijiji. Kituo cha kaskazini cha NY 377 pia hutumika kama mlango wa kusini wa Makaburi ya Vijijini ya Albany.

Raghavendra Rao. His first shot at Telugu films was "Student No.1", with "Jr. NTR" in 2001. It took two years for Rajamouli to come up with his second movie "Simhadri". In the two-year gap between "Student No.1" and "Simhadri", Rajamouli planned his first mythological film with Malayalam actor Mohanlal, but the film eventually got shelved. In 2015, Assistant art director Manu Jagath, who later worked as the art director for Baahubali, released several sketches he had drawn for the shelved Mohanlal project. Rajamouli's third movie was "Sye", with actors Nithin and Genelia D'Souza. It was a first-of-its-kind movie in Tollywood, in that it was based on a rugby game. This movie was also the first instance where Rajamouli collaborated with K. K. Senthil Kumar. His next was "Chatrapathi", with the music of M. M. Keeravani and cinematography by Senthil Kumar.

claim: The Young Men’s Christian Association (YMCA) was founded on 6 June 1844 in London by George Williams, who sought to provide wholesome, spiritually focused activities for young men migrating to industrial cities
question_en: When was the YMCA founded?
report_en: The Young Men’s Christian Association (YMCA) was founded on 6 June 1844 in London by George Williams, who sought to provide wholesome, spiritually focused activities for young men migrating to industrial cities [1].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: YMCA
Content: The YMCA was founded by George Williams, a London draper, who was typical of the young men drawn to the cities by the Industrial Revolution. He and his colleagues were concerned about the lack of healthy activities for young men in major cities; the options available were usually taverns and brothels. Williams's idea grew out of meetings he held for prayer and Bible-reading among his fellow-workers in a business in the city of London, and on 6 June 1844, he founded the first YMCA in London with the purpose of "the improving of the spiritual condition of young men engaged in the drapery, embroidery, and other trades." By 1851, there were YMCAs in the United Kingdom, Australia, Belgium, Canada, France, Germany, the Netherlands, Switzerland, and the United States.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: YMCA
Content: Ushirikiano wa Kimataifa wa Vyuo Vikuu vya YMCA huleta pamoja vyuo vikuu kutoka ulimwenguni kote, pamoja na Brazil, England, Ujerumani, Hong Kong, India, Mexico, Uruguay, USA, na Venezuela. Vyuo vikuu vinatoa kozi mbali mbali kwenye viwango tofauti.
Vyuo vikuu vingi na vyuo vikuu vilikuwa na kihistoria vilikuwa na uhusiano na YMCA. Chuo cha Springfield, cha Springfield, Massachusetts, kilianzishwa mnamo 1885 kama shule ya mafunzo ya kimataifa kwa wataalamu wa YMCA, wakati moja ya shule hizo mbili ambazo baadaye zikawa Chuo Kikuu cha Concordia - Chuo cha George Williams - kilianza kutoka kozi za usiku zilizotolewa katika Montreal YMCA. Chuo Kikuu cha Kaskazini mashariki kilianza kutoka YMCA huko Boston, na Chuo Kikuu cha Franklin kilianza kama Shule ya Biashara ya YMCA. Chuo Kikuu cha San Francisco cha Golden Gate kinafuatilia mizizi yake hadi kuanzishwa kwa Shule ya Usiku ya YMCA mnamo 1 Novemba 1881. Chuo cha Sheria cha Detroit, sasa Chuo cha Sheria cha Chuo Kikuu cha Michigan, kilianzishwa na uhusiano mkubwa na Detroit, Michigan YMCA. Ilikuwa na kukodisha kwa miaka 99 kwenye tovuti, na ilikuwa tu wakati ilimalizika kwamba chuo kilihamia Lansing Mashariki, Michigan. Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la Youngstown kinafuatilia mizizi yake kwa uanzishwaji wa shule ya sheria na YMCA ya eneo hilo mnamo 1908. Shule ya sheria ya Nashville ilikuwa Shule ya Sheria ya Usiku ya YMCA hadi Novemba 1986, ikiwa imetoa madarasa ya sheria tangu 1911 na kiwango cha daktari wa Juris tangu Januari 1927. YMCA ilifanya wazo la shule ya usiku. YMCA nyingi hutoa mipango ya ESL, shule mbadala ya upili, utunzaji wa siku, na mipango ya kambi ya majira ya joto. Huko India, Chuo Kikuu cha Sayansi na Teknolojia cha YMCA Faridabad kilianzishwa mnamo 1969. Inatoa programu mbali mbali zinazohusiana na sayansi na uhandisi.

claim: In adults, the human vertebral column contains 24 separate (movable) vertebrae—7 cervical, 12 thoracic, and 5 lumbar—plus two composite bones: the sacrum (formed from five fused vertebrae) and the coccyx (formed from three to five fused vertebrae), giving a total of 26 distinct bones; if every fused segment of the sacrum and coccyx is counted individually, the original number rises to 32–34, which equals the 33 separate vertebrae present at birth before normal fusion occurs
question_en: How many vertebrae does a human have?
report_en: In adults, the human vertebral column contains 24 separate (movable) vertebrae—7 cervical, 12 thoracic, and 5 lumbar—plus two composite bones: the sacrum (formed from five fused vertebrae) and the coccyx (formed from three to five fused vertebrae), giving a total of 26 distinct bones; if every fused segment of the sacrum and coccyx is counted individually, the original number rises to 32–34, which equals the 33 separate vertebrae present at birth before normal fusion occurs [1].
all_claims: In adults, the human vertebral column contains 24 separate (movable) vertebrae—7 cervical, 12 thoracic, and 5 lumbar—plus two composite bones: the sacrum (formed from five fused vertebrae) and the coccyx (formed from three to five fused vertebrae), giving a total of 26 distinct bones; if every fused segment of the sacrum and coccyx is counted individually, the original number rises to 32–34, which equals the 33 separate vertebrae present at birth before normal fusion occurs [1].
claims_retained: In adults, the human vertebral column contains 24 separate (movable) vertebrae—7 cervical, 12 thoracic, and 5 lumbar—plus two composite bones: the sacrum (formed from five fused vertebrae) and the coccyx (formed from three to five fused vertebrae), giving a total of 26 distinct bones; if every fused segment of the sacrum and coccyx is counted individually, the original number rises to 32–34, which equals the 33 separate vertebrae present at birth before normal fusion occurs [1].
prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Axial skeleton
Content: At birth the majority of humans have 33 separate vertebrae. However, during normal development several vertebrae fuse together, leaving a total of 24, in most cases. The confusion about whether or not there are 32-34 vertebrae stems from the fact that the two lowest vertebrae, the sacrum and the coccyx, are single bones made up of several smaller bones which have fused together. This is how the vertebrae are counted: 24 separate vertebrae and the sacrum, formed from 5 fused vertebrae and the coccyx, formed from 3-5 fused vertebrae. If you count the coccyx and sacrum each as one vertebra, then there are 26 vertebrae. If the fused vertebrae are all counted separately, then the total number of vertebrae comes to between 32 and 34.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Paka anatomy
Content: Paka zina vertebrae saba za kizazi kama karibu mamalia wote, vertebrae kumi na tatu (wanadamu wana miaka kumi na mbili), vertebrae saba (wanadamu wana watano), vertebrae tatu (wanadamu wana watano kwa sababu ya mkao wao wa bipedal), na, isipokuwa kwa paka za Manx na vifungo viwili vya watu wa ishirini na mbili. watano, waliingizwa kwenye coccyx ya ndani). Akaunti ya ziada ya lumbar na thoracic vertebrae kwa uhamaji wa mgongo ulioimarishwa wa paka na kubadilika, ikilinganishwa na wanadamu. Vertebrae ya caudal huunda "mkia", inayotumiwa na paka kama kukabiliana na mwili wakati wa harakati za haraka. Kati ya vertebrae yao, wana diski za elastic, muhimu kwa kutua kutua kwa kuruka.

Title: Taensa
Content: The Taensa and the closely related Natchez are descendants of the late prehistoric Plaquemine culture (1200-1700 CE). The Plaquemine culture was a Mississippian culture variant centered on the Lower Mississippi River valley. They had complex political and religious institutions and lived in large villages centered on ceremonial platform mounds. They were primarily agriculturists who grew maize, pumpkins, squash, beans and tobacco. They had a deep history in the area stretching back through the earlier Coles Creek (700-1200 CE) and Troyville cultures (400-700 CE) to the Marksville culture (100 BCE to 400 CE), which was contemporaneous with the Hopewell cultures of present-day Ohio and Illinois.

Elizabeth Blackwell played an important role in both the United States and the United Kingdom as a social and moral reformer. She acted as a pioneer in promoting the education of women in medicine. Elizabeth Blackwell's contributions remain celebrated through an Elizabeth Blackwell medal that is awarded to one woman every year who has added to the cause of promoting women in medicine. Furthermore, Hobart and William Smith College recently created a statue on their campus honoring Elizabeth Blackwell.

claim: The fastest-firing machine gun commonly fielded is the electrically driven M134 Minigun, whose six rotating barrels can sustain over 100 rounds per second, equivalent to about 6,000 rounds per minute (RPM) in cyclic rate of fire
question_en: How fast is the fastest firing machine gun?
report_en: The fastest-firing machine gun commonly fielded is the electrically driven M134 Minigun, whose six rotating barrels can sustain over 100 rounds per second, equivalent to about 6,000 rounds per minute (RPM) in cyclic rate of fire [1].
all_claims: The fastest-firing machine gun commonly fielded is the electrically driven M134 Minigun, whose six rotating barrels can sustain over 100 rounds per second, equivalent to about 6,000 rounds per minute (RPM) in cyclic rate of fire [1].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Rate of fire
Content: This is the mechanical rate of fire, or how fast the weapon "cycles" (loads, locks, fires, unlocks, ejects). Measurement of the cyclic rate assumes that the weapon is being operated as fast as possible and does not consider operator tasks (magazine changes, aiming, etc.). When the trigger is pulled, the rate at which rounds are fired is the cyclic rate. Typical cyclic rates of fire are 600–900 RPM for assault rifles, 1,000-1,100 RPM in some cases, 900-1,200 RPM for submachine guns and machine pistols, and 600-1,500 RPM for machine guns. M134 Miniguns mounted on attack helicopters and other combat vehicles can achieve rates of fire of over 100 rounds per second (6,000 RPM). Cyclic rate of fire is the only rate that can be determined precisely.
---

Title: Kuchora haraka
Content: Kuchora haraka ni moja ya michezo ya haraka sana ulimwenguni. Kila wakati hupimwa chini ya sekunde moja, kutoka ishara hadi wakati timer imesimamishwa. Rekodi ya sasa ya Chama cha Draw ya Ulimwenguni (WFDA) ya kuchora kwa haraka darasa katika hafla inayoitwa baluni zilizosimama ni sekunde .208 - na hiyo ni pamoja na wakati inachukua kuguswa, kuchora, moto na pop lengo la puto kwa umbali wa futi nane. Mshindani wa darasa la ulimwengu anaweza kuteka na kuchoma risasi chini ya nusu ya sekunde. Ikizingatiwa kuwa wakati wa wastani wa athari ya mwanadamu ni karibu sekunde 0.2 hadi 0.25, pande zote zimekwisha kabla ya watu wengi kuguswa. Nyakati za athari za wapiga risasi bora wa haraka ni sekunde 0.145, ambayo inamaanisha kuwa bunduki imechomwa, hutolewa, inayolenga (kutoka kwa kiboko), na kufutwa kwa zaidi ya sekunde 0.06. Ili kuanzisha rekodi ya ushirika wa ulimwengu wa haraka, risasi ya pili lazima iachishwe katika mashindano yale yale ambayo sio zaidi ya sekunde 0.30 polepole kuliko ya kwanza; Hii imekusudiwa kuzuia risasi ambayo inatarajia ishara ya kuanza kutoka kuweka rekodi. Katika mashindano ambapo raundi mbili lazima zifutwe, kwa malengo tofauti, chini ya sekunde 0.10 kutenganisha shots.

claim: Melioidosis is a recognized infectious disease in humans; its onset may occur years after exposure because the organism can remain dormant, so patients often lack a clear history of soil contact at presentation
question_en: Does melioidosis affect humans?
report_en: Yes. Melioidosis is a recognized infectious disease in humans; its onset may occur years after exposure because the organism can remain dormant, so patients often lack a clear history of soil contact at presentation [1]. Consequently, clinicians are urged to consider melioidosis in any febrile individual who has lived in or returned from endemic regions, highlighting its significance as a human health threat among residents and travellers alike [1].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Reflection seismology
Content: The Canadian inventor Reginald Fessenden was the first to conceive of using reflected seismic waves to infer geology. His work was initially on the propagation of acoustic waves in water, motivated by the sinking of the Titanic by an iceberg in 1912. He also worked on methods of detecting submarines during World War I. He applied for the first patent on a seismic exploration method in 1914, which was issued in 1917. Due to the war, he was unable to follow up on the idea. John Clarence Karcher discovered seismic reflections independently while working for the United States Bureau of Standards (now the National Institute of Standards and Technology) on methods of sound ranging to detect artillery. In discussion with colleagues, the idea developed that these reflections could aid in exploration for petroleum. With several others, many affiliated with the University of Oklahoma, Karcher helped to form the Geological Engineering Company, incorporated in Oklahoma in April, 1920. The first field tests were conducted near Oklahoma City, Oklahoma in 1921.

Njia hiyo inahitaji chanzo cha nguvu kinachodhibitiwa cha nishati, kama vile mlipuko wa nguvu au tovex, bunduki maalum ya hewa au vibrator ya seismic, inayojulikana na jina la alama ya vibroseis. Seismology ya Tafakari ni sawa na sonar na echolocation. Nakala hii ni juu ya uchunguzi wa uso wa uso; Kwa maelezo mafupi ya wima ya wima, ona VSP.
Tafakari na viboreshaji vya mawimbi ya mshikamano katika miingiliano ya jiografia ndani ya Dunia ilizingatiwa kwanza kwenye rekodi za mawimbi ya mshtuko wa tetemeko la ardhi. Mfano wa msingi wa mambo ya ndani ya ulimwengu ni msingi wa uchunguzi wa mawimbi ya mshtuko wa tetemeko la ardhi yanayopitishwa kupitia mambo ya ndani ya Dunia (k.m. Mohorovičić, 1910). Matumizi ya mawimbi ya kibinadamu yaliyotokana na kibinadamu kuweka ramani kwa undani jiografia ya kilomita chache za juu za ukoko wa Dunia ilifuatiwa muda mfupi baadaye na imeendelea sana kwa sababu ya biashara ya kibiashara, haswa tasnia ya petroli.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Rugby football
Content: Rugby refers to the team sports rugby league and rugby union. Legend claims that Rugby football was started around the time of 1845 in Rugby School, Rugby, Warwickshire, England, although forms of football in which the ball was carried and tossed date to medieval times. Rugby eventually split into two sports in 1895 when twenty one clubs split from the original Rugby Football Union, to form the Northern Union (later to be named rugby league in 1922) in the George Hotel, Huddersfield, Northern England over the issue of payment to players, thus making rugby league the first code to turn professional and pay its players, rugby union turned fully professional in 1995. Both sports are run by their respective world governing bodies World Rugby (rugby union) and the Rugby League International Federation (rugby league). Rugby football was one of many versions of football played at English public schools in the 19th century. Although rugby league initially used rugby union rules, they are now wholly separate sports. In addition to these two codes, both American and Canadian football evolved from rugby football.

Title: Barabara ya Rugby
Content: Sehemu muhimu ya Barabara ya Rugby ni "Daraja la Beta". Mnamo miaka ya 1850, daraja lilijengwa juu ya nyimbo za treni za Chesapeake na Ohio katika eneo ambalo sasa ni Bridge ya Beta, lakini muundo wa sasa ulijengwa mnamo 1923. Daraja hilo lilikuwa sehemu ya mradi wa kutengeneza jiji na uboreshaji wa mitaa ya Charlottesville kwa gari. Ingawa hapo awali ilijulikana kama Daraja la Barabara ya Rugby, wakati udugu wa Beta Theta Pi ulipounda nyumba yao kwenye kona ya Chancellor na Rugby mnamo 1927, ilichukua jina lake la sasa. Mnamo 1971, eneo hilo la udugu lilifungwa, na udugu wa Delta Upsilon ulihamia katika eneo lake la sasa katika Barabara ya Rugby 180. Kama wachunguzi wasio rasmi wa daraja, ndugu na ahadi za DU zingechora ujumbe wa kukera au ujumbe ambao haukuwa na 'thx du' (kwa "asante Delta Upsilon"). Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, Beta Theta Pi alirudi ndani ya nyumba yao ya asili karibu na daraja, na sasa ujumbe kawaida una 'thx beta'.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Banksia menziesii
Content: First described by the botanist Robert Brown in the early 19th century, no separate varieties of "Banksia menziesii" are recognised. It is found in Western Australia, from the Perth (32° S) region north to the Murchison River (27° S), and generally grows on sandy soils, in scrubland or low woodland. "Banksia menziesii" provides food for a wide array of invertebrate and vertebrate animals; birds and in particular honeyeaters are prominent visitors. A relatively hardy plant, "Banksia menziesii" is commonly seen in gardens, nature strips and parks in Australian urban areas with Mediterranean climates, but its sensitivity to dieback from the soil-borne water mould "Phytophthora cinnamomi" makes it short-lived in places with humid summers, such as Sydney. "Banksia menziesii" is widely used in the cut flower industry both in Australia and overseas.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: History of science fiction films
Content: Science fiction films appeared very early in the silent film era. The initial attempts were short films of typically 1 to 2 minutes in duration, shot in black and white, but sometimes with colour tinting. These usually had a technological theme, and were often intended to be humorous. "Le Voyage dans la Lune", created by Georges Méliès in 1902 is often considered to be the first science fiction film. It drew upon Jules Verne and H. G. Wells in its depiction of a spacecraft being launched to the moon in a large cannon. Its ground-breaking special effects pioneered the way for future science-fiction films, and it became largely popular after its release.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: John Part
Content: John Part (born June 29, 1966) is a Canadian professional darts player and commentator, nicknamed Darth Maple. Part is a three-times World Champion, having won the 1994 BDO World Darts Championship, and the PDC World Championship in 2003 and 2008. He is statistically North America's greatest darts player to date. He has the distinction of being the first non-UK player to win the World Championship, and the only non-European to date to win the PDC World Darts Championship. His first Championship was the second time a non-seeded player won the BDO World Darts Championship, and one of the few times where a player only lost one set in the entire tournament. His nine year gap between his first and second World Championships is tied with Ted Hankey for the longest gap between World Championships, and his third triumph in 2008 saw him become the first player in history to win a world title in three different venues, and the first to win at the Alexandra Palace. His 2008 win saw him join Phil Taylor, Eric Bristow, Raymond van Barneveld and John Lowe as the only players with three or more World Championships, and become only the second player (after Taylor) to win multiple PDC titles. His eleven televised PDC finals is tied with Dennis Priestley for the eighth most all time, and his £874,151 in prize money to date is the sixteenth highest amount in PDC history.

Kwa kweli, Panzer ndiye muuaji. Jane anatuhumu Panzer lakini hapo awali hana dhibitisho la kumfunua. Wakati yeye na Panzer wote wanaonekana kwenye kipindi cha mazungumzo cha televisheni cha Karen Cross kinachojadili kesi ya SJK, Jane anatambua Panzer lazima asimamishwe na Goads Panzer kulinganisha Red John vibaya na SJK. Panzer anaongezeka kwa bait, na kutoa taarifa za ujasiri kwamba mauaji ya SJK yalikuwa kazi ya fikra na nyekundu John kwa kulinganisha ni "" jamii ya kawaida, wavivu, dhaifu, ya udanganyifu "" na tayari amesahau tangu Jane kumuua. Panzer basi hufanya kosa lile lile lililofanywa na Jane na Kristina Frye: kumdharau Red John kwenye mkutano wa umma. Mauaji ya Panzer yanathibitisha nadharia ya Jane kwamba Red John bado yuko hai. Hii inafanya Panzer Red John wa tisa wa kiume.

Title: Mantis
Content: The closest relatives of mantises are the termites and cockroaches (Blattodea), which are all within the superorder Dictyoptera. Mantises are sometimes confused with stick insects (Phasmatodea), other elongated insects such as grasshoppers (Orthoptera), or other unrelated insects with raptorial forelegs such as mantisflies (Mantispidae). Mantises are mostly ambush predators, but a few ground-dwelling species are found actively pursuing their prey. They normally live for about a year. In cooler climates, the adults lay eggs in autumn, then die. The eggs are protected by their hard capsules and hatch in the spring. Females sometimes practice sexual cannibalism, eating their mates after copulation.

Title: Verdigris
Content: Verdigris is the common name for a green pigment obtained through the application of acetic acid to copper plates or the natural patina formed when copper, brass or bronze is weathered and exposed to air or seawater over a period of time. It is usually a basic copper carbonate, but near the sea will be a basic copper chloride. If acetic acid is present at the time of weathering, it may consist of copper(II) acetate.

claim: Yes, a septic tank can explode because the decomposition of sewage produces sewer gas that contains methane and hydrogen sulfide, both highly flammable and potentially explosive; gas ignition can occur if the mixture contacts an open flame or sparks
question_en: Can a septic tank explode?
report_en: Yes, a septic tank can explode because the decomposition of sewage produces sewer gas that contains methane and hydrogen sulfide, both highly flammable and potentially explosive; gas ignition can occur if the mixture contacts an open flame or sparks [1]. Methane levels have been measured up to about 300 ppmv in closed drains just 2 cm above the sewage, significantly higher than the 7–15 ppmv commonly found in open sewers, indicating that enclosed systems like septic tanks can accumulate concentrations high enough to reach their explosive limits if ventilation is inadequate [1].

Title: Mizinga ya kipindi cha vita
Content: Wafaransa walitumia mizinga anuwai sana, pamoja na aina nyingi za kipekee. Ufaransa ilikuwa mtayarishaji wa pili wa tank kubwa ulimwenguni, nyuma ya Umoja wa Soviet (ona uzalishaji wa gari la Ufaransa la kupigania wakati wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili). Darasa la tank yao ya wapanda farasi lilijaza jukumu la kile kinachoitwa MBTs. Pia waliweka muundo mzito wa tank, na aina kadhaa nyepesi kwa skauti na msaada wa watoto wachanga. Mbali na aina hizi, walikuwa pia wakifanya kazi kwenye mizinga ya mafanikio makubwa (FCM F1). Mfaransa hakuwa na miili huru ya tank. Mizinga yote ilikuwa ya watoto wachanga au wapanda farasi. Content: The company was founded on November 26, 1905, when Florence Butt opened the C.C. Butt Grocery Store on the ground floor of her family home in Kerrville, Texas. In 1919, Howard Edward Butt, Florence's youngest son, took over the store upon his return from World War I. Shortly after becoming owner of his mother's small store, Howard tried four expansions into Central Texas, including one in Junction, all of which failed. Finally, in 1927, Howard launched a successful second store in Del Rio, Texas, followed by the purchase of three grocery stores in the Lower Rio Grande Valley. The first initials of Howard E. Butt became the name of the store.

Title: Endocrinology
Content: The earliest study of endocrinology began in China. The Chinese were isolating sex and pituitary hormones from human urine and using them for medicinal purposes by 200 BCE. They used many complex methods, such as sublimation of steroid hormones. Another method specified by Chinese texts—the earliest dating to 1110—specified the use of saponin (from the beans of "Gleditsia sinensis") to extract hormones, but gypsum (containing calcium sulfate) was also known to have been used.

The Army is composed of roughly 40,100 regular uniformed personnel, augmented by 12,300 reserve force personnel. The rank/age structure of the army, which deteriorated desperately during the 1990s, is greatly improving through the Military Skills Development (MSDS) voluntary national service system. prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: The Doctor (Doctor Who)
Content: The character of the Doctor was created by BBC Head of Drama, Sydney Newman. The first format document for the programme that was to become "Doctor Who" – then provisionally titled "The Troubleshooters" – was written in March 1963 by C. E. Webber, a staff writer who had been brought in to help develop the project. Webber's document contained a main character described as "The maturer man, 35–40, with some 'character twist.' " Newman was not keen on this idea and – along with several other changes to Webber's initial format – created an alternative lead character named Dr Who, a crotchety older man piloting a stolen time machine, on the run from his own far future world. No written record of Newman's conveyance of these ideas – believed to have taken place in April 1963 – exists, and the character of Dr Who first begins appearing in existing documentation from May of that year.
---

Davies), tabia ya Vince ilionyeshwa kama shabiki wa "Daktari Who", na marejeleo yaliyoonekana mara nyingi katika mfumo wa sehemu hiyo. Vivyo hivyo, tabia ya Oliver kwenye "Coupling" (iliyoundwa na kuandikwa na mkimbiaji wa show ya sasa Steven Moffat) imeonyeshwa kama "Daktari Ambaye" Mkusanya na Mshiriki.
Marejeleo ya "Daktari Who" pia yameonekana katika riwaya za vijana za watu wazima "Brisingr" na "Wizardry ya Juu", mchezo wa video "Rock Band", watu wazima wa kuogelea wanaonyesha "Robot Kuku", "Familia ya Familia" "Blue Hana" na "420", na mchezo "Runescape". Pia imerejelewa katika "Waharibu Wanadamu wote! 2", na raia katika tofauti za mchezo wa England, na mara kadhaa katika safu ya "Wakili wa Ace".

The Prime Minister chairs the Cabinet of Malaysia, the de facto executive branch of government. prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: XETV-TDT
Content: As the original American digital television transition date of 17 February 2009 approached, XETV had expressed intentions to follow other San Diego-area stations in ceasing transmission of its analog signal. While the U.S. switchover deadline of 17 February was later pushed back to 12 June 2009 and only applied to American-licensed stations in any case, plans were announced to voluntarily make the station's English-language programming digital-only. The analog signal would be repurposed to retransmit the Mexican Galavisión network (not to be confused with the American cable channel of the same name). Claims on XETV's website that the station was indeed going to transmit a digitally-exclusive signal were rescinded on 17 February 2009 as the station decided to delay cutting off its analog signal until after it secured approval from the Mexican government. XETV management later stated that it had decided to maintain its analog signal to benefit Mexican viewers. XETV's analog signal was eventually repurposed on 5 March 2012, when the station began multicasting on its digital signal with the addition of Televisa's youth-oriented Canal 5 network on subchannel 6.2 and on its analog feed, while digital channel 6.1 retained the newscasts, CW network and syndicated programs in English. On the same date, XHBJ-TV channel 45 dropped Canal 5 for Galavisión. Canal 5 replaced XETV's English-language programming on its analog signal, in order to serve Spanish-speaking viewers in Tijuana that did not have television sets with built-in digital tuners or digital converter boxes prior to the Tijuana market's 2013 transition to digital television. The affiliation switch coincided with the commencement of digital multicasting on Televisa's Tijuana stations. Canal 5 moved to its primary channel on 31 May 2017, at which point, the 6.2 subchannel was decommissioned.

question_en: How much dopamine is in the human brain?
report_en: Because dopamine is constantly synthesized, released, taken back up and enzymatically degraded, its absolute quantity is not fixed, but biochemical measurements in post-mortem tissue indicate that the entire human brain typically contains only a few milligrams of free dopamine at any moment (well below 0.01 g). This modest pool is maintained by roughly 400,000 dopaminergic neurons whose cell bodies are clustered in six small mid-brain and hypothalamic regions (substantia nigra, ventral tegmental area, posterior hypothalamus, arcuate nucleus, zona incerta and periventricular nucleus, corresponding to groups A8–A14) but whose axons project widely and exert strong modulatory effects across the brain [1].
all_claims: Because dopamine is constantly synthesized, released, taken back up and enzymatically degraded, its absolute quantity is not fixed, but biochemical measurements in post-mortem tissue indicate that the entire human brain typically contains only a few milligrams of free dopamine at any moment (well below 0.01 g).

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Dopamine
Content: Dopaminergic neurons (dopamine-producing nerve cells) are comparatively few in number—a total of around 400,000 in the human brain—and their cell bodies are confined in groups to a few relatively small brain areas. However their axons project to many other brain areas, and they exert powerful effects on their targets. These dopaminergic cell groups were first mapped in 1964 by Annica Dahlström and Kjell Fuxe, who assigned them labels starting with the letter "A" (for "aminergic"). In their scheme, areas A1 through A7 contain the neurotransmitter norepinephrine, whereas A8 through A14 contain dopamine. The dopaminergic areas they identified are the substantia nigra (groups 8 and 9); the ventral tegmental area (group 10); the posterior hypothalamus (group 11); the arcuate nucleus (group 12); the zona incerta (group 13) and the periventricular nucleus (group 14).

Dawa za Neuroleptic (antipsychotic), ambazo wakati mwingine hutumiwa kutibu schizophrenia, kulenga mfumo wa dopamine.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Imperial Japanese Navy in World War II
Content: Even after the disaster at Philippine Sea, the IJN was still a formidable force. Of the 12 battleships that were available at the beginning of the war in 1941-42, nine still remained operational, together with 14 out of the original 18 heavy cruisers. However, efforts to rebuild the carrier force were unsuccessful since the training given to new aviators was of a very low standard. Consequently, the new carriers never went to sea with a full air group. This left the Japanese with a ragtag collection of carriers, led by the "Zuikaku", which was the sole survivor of the Pearl Harbor attack force. The Japanese were left with two choices, either to commit their remaining strength in an all-out offensive, or to sit by while the Americans occupied the Philippines and cut the sea lanes between Japan and vital resources from the Dutch East Indies and Malaya. The plan devised by the Japanese was a final attempt to create a decisive battle by utilizing their last remaining strength, the firepower of its heavy cruisers and battleships, which were to be all committed against the American beachhead at Leyte. The Japanese planned to use their remaining carriers as bait, in order to lure the American carriers away from Leyte Gulf long enough for the heavy warships to enter and destroy any American ships present.

claim: Supportive care targets the organs most affected: dialysis may be required for acute kidney injury or severe hyperphosphatemia, while calcium carbonate is given orally once serum calcium is checked to control phosphate levels
question_en: Can leptospirosis be cured?
report_en: Yes—because leptospirosis is a bacterial infection, it can usually be cured when diagnosis is prompt and appropriate therapy is started; standard practice is to give effective antibiotics (e.g., doxycycline or penicillin) early and provide supportive measures until the infection and its complications resolve. Supportive care targets the organs most affected: dialysis may be required for acute kidney injury or severe hyperphosphatemia, while calcium carbonate is given orally once serum calcium is checked to control phosphate levels [1]. In patients with pronounced bleeding tendencies, some specialists recommend a short course (7–10 days) of tapering corticosteroids such as prednisolone to curb hemorrhagic inflammation [1]. Outcomes are generally favorable when treatment begins in the first week of illness, with reported case-fatality rates falling below 5 % in high-resource settings; delays, however, allow the bacteria to damage the liver, kidneys, lungs, or heart and can push mortality above 10 %. Therefore, early medical attention and adherence to antibiotic and organ-specific management plans give most patients an excellent chance of full recovery.
all_claims: Yes—because leptospirosis is a bacterial infection, it can usually be cured when diagnosis is prompt and appropriate therapy is started; standard practice is to give effective antibiotics (e.g., doxycycline or penicillin) early and provide supportive measures until the infection and its complications resolve.

Supportive care targets the organs most affected: dialysis may be required for acute kidney injury or severe hyperphosphatemia, while calcium carbonate is given orally once serum calcium is checked to control phosphate levels [1].
In patients with pronounced bleeding tendencies, some specialists recommend a short course (7–10 days) of tapering corticosteroids such as prednisolone to curb hemorrhagic inflammation [1].

Outcomes are generally favorable when treatment begins in the first week of illness, with reported case-fatality rates falling below 5 % in high-resource settings; delays, however, allow the bacteria to damage the liver, kidneys, lungs, or heart and can push mortality above 10 %.
Therefore, early medical attention and adherence to antibiotic and organ-specific management plans give most patients an excellent chance of full recovery.
claims_retained: Supportive care targets the organs most affected: dialysis may be required for acute kidney injury or severe hyperphosphatemia, while calcium carbonate is given orally once serum calcium is checked to control phosphate levels [1].
In patients with pronounced bleeding tendencies, some specialists recommend a short course (7–10 days) of tapering corticosteroids such as prednisolone to curb hemorrhagic inflammation [1].

Administration of corticosteroids in gradually reduced doses (e.g., prednisolone) for 7–10 days is recommended by some specialists in cases of severe hemorrhagic effects. Organ-specific care and treatment are essential in cases of kidney, liver, or heart involvement.

Title: Leptospira noguchii
Content: "Leptospira noguchii" ni bakteria nyingine ya pathogenic ambayo husababisha leptospirosis. Leptospirosis inaweza kuhamishwa kwa njia nyingi. Leptospirosis inaweza kuhamisha kutoka kwa wanyama kwenda kwa wanadamu (zoonosis), wanadamu kwa wanadamu, au wanyama kwa wanyama kupitia ulaji wa maji yaliyochafuliwa, kama mkojo na damu. Ugonjwa huo kawaida huchukuliwa kupitia utando wa mucosal wa mnyama mwingine au mwanadamu na hutolewa kutoka kwa mwili kwenye mkojo. Mtu aliyeambukizwa anaweza kuwa asymptomatic au ana dalili kali sana. Katika hali mbaya, kushindwa kwa figo au ini, meningitis ya aseptic, na hemorrhages mbaya ya mapafu imetokea kwa wanadamu.

Throughout the story, Gollum was torn between his lust for the Ring and his desire to be free of it. Bilbo Baggins found the Ring and took it for his own, and Gollum afterwards pursued it for the rest of his life. Title: Gollum
Content: Bilbo Baggins alijikwaa juu ya lair ya Gollum, baada ya kupata pete kwenye mtandao wa vichungi vya Goblin vinavyoelekea chini ya ziwa. Mwisho wake gizani, Bilbo alikubali mchezo wa kitendawili na Gollum kwenye nafasi ya kuonyeshwa njia ya kutoka milimani. Katika toleo la kwanza la "The Hobbit", saizi ya Gollum haijaelezewa. Ni katika toleo lililorekebishwa tu ambalo limetajwa kuwa yeye ni mdogo na kwa kweli ni Hobbit isiyo ya kawaida. Hapo awali alikuwa na sifa ya kuwa amefungwa sana kwenye pete kuliko matoleo ya baadaye; Alijitolea kutoa pete kwa Bilbo ikiwa amepoteza mchezo wa kitendawili, na alionyesha Bilbo njia ya kutoka milimani baada ya kupoteza. Ili kutoshea wazo la pete ya kutawala ambayo iliibuka wakati wa uandishi wa "Bwana wa pete", Tolkien alirekebisha matoleo ya baadaye ya "The Hobbit": toleo la hadithi lililotolewa katika toleo la kwanza likawa uwongo ambao Bilbo alifanya kuhalalisha milki yake ya pete kwa vibanda na Gandalf. Katika toleo jipya Gollum alijifanya angeonyesha Bilbo njia ya kutoka ikiwa atapoteza mchezo wa kitendawili, lakini kwa kweli alipanga kutumia pete kuua na kula hobbit. Kugundua pete haipo, ghafla aligundua jibu la kitendawili cha mwisho cha Bilbo - "Nimepata nini mfukoni mwangu?" - na akaruka kwa hasira. Bilbo aligundua kwa nguvu nguvu ya pete ya kutoonekana wakati anakimbia, na kumruhusu kufuata Gollum bila kutambuliwa kwa mlango wa nyuma wa mapango. Gollum alikuwa ameshawishika kwamba Bilbo alijua njia ya nje wakati wote, na alitarajia kumkataza karibu na mlango, isije goblins kumkamata Bilbo na kupata pete. Mwanzoni Bilbo alifikiria kumuua Gollum ili kutoroka, lakini alishikwa na huruma, na kwa hivyo akaruka juu yake tu. Kama Bilbo alitoroka, Gollum alilia, "Mwizi, mwizi, mwizi! Baggins! Tunachukia, tunachukia, tunachukia milele!"

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Canada's Worst Driver
Content: Canada's Worst Driver is a Canadian television series on Discovery Channel, based on "Britain's Worst Driver" and is part of the Worst Driver television franchise. The series is produced by Proper Television, whose president, Guy O'Sullivan, was the director of the original "Britain's Worst Driver" series until its cancellation in 2003. O'Sullivan served as executive producer of "Canada's Worst Driver" until his death in April 2017, doubling as executive producer of sister series "Canada's Worst Handyman" until its cancellation in 2011. As such, "Canada's Worst Driver" is considered to be the production company's flagship show and, with 14 seasons aired as of December 2018, the longest-running of any "Worst" series to date. Unlike other "Worst" series around the world, where being a graduate is rewarded with a new car while the Worst Driver has their car destroyed, "Canada's Worst Driver" emphasizes the learning process of the contestants and the science of driving and is often more serious than any other "Worst Driver" version around the world, awarding no prizes aside from a trophy at the end of each season for being named the worst (with the exception of season twelve, in which, despite ultimately being named the worst, Krystal McCann wasn't even worthy of being awarded the trophy, leading to Tyler Dupont becoming the first-ever nominee to be awarded the "Final Graduate" trophy), as the point of the show is to educate rather than entertain, as other versions are mainly comedic. The series is also aired dubbed in French in Canada as "Les Pires Chauffards Canadiens" on the Z channel. Until 2011, when "Canada's Worst Handyman" was cancelled and later replaced in 2015 with "Blood, Sweat & Tools," "Canada's Worst Driver" and "Canada's Worst Handyman" were the two highest-rated programs on Discovery Channel Canada.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: History of psychology
Content: Psychology was a branch of the domain of philosophy until the 1870s, when it developed as an independent scientific discipline in Germany and the United States. Psychology as a self-conscious field of experimental study began in 1879, in Leipzig Germany, when Wilhelm Wundt founded the first laboratory dedicated exclusively to psychological research in Germany. Wundt was also the first person to refer to himself as "a psychologist". Other important early contributors to the field include Hermann Ebbinghaus (a pioneer in the study of memory), William James (the American father of pragmatism), and Ivan Pavlov (who developed the procedures associated with classical conditioning).
---

Title: Project manager
Content: A project manager is a professional in the field of project management. Project managers have the responsibility of the planning, procurement and execution of a project, in any undertaking that has a defined scope, defined start and a defined finish; regardless of industry. Project managers are first point of contact for any issues or discrepancies arising from within the heads of various departments in an organization before the problem escalates to higher authorities. Project management is the responsibility of a project manager. This individual seldom participates directly in the activities that produce the end result, but rather strives to maintain the progress, mutual interaction and tasks of various parties in such a way that reduces the risk of overall failure, maximizes benefits, and minimizes costs.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Red-eared firetail
Content: The red-eared firetail is a seed eating estrildid, discreet and unusually solitary for an Australian grass finch species. This species often remains unobserved in dense vegetation while foraging in the lower storey. Their presence is revealed by distinctive calls and the bird is most frequently seen when perched high on the limb of a tree such as marri. The individuals form mated pairs rather than grouping. Their individual range is an area around one to two hundred metres across and they may join others while feeding where their territories overlap. Earnest defence of sites only occurs close to the nest, so boundaries between pairs may intersect without incident. Fledglings are eventually fought and driven from the nest site.

Inatokea katika mimea yenye unyevu wa ardhi ya pwani kwa mikoa ndogo ya pwani huko Australia Kusini. Muonekano wake unachukuliwa kuwa wa kupendeza, na matangazo meupe, kuzuia nyeusi na alama za wazi kwenye sikio na mkia wa juu. Firetails nyekundu-eared kawaida huangaziwa kwa ufupi tu, ikiwa kabisa, kwani wanaenda haraka na kwa busara kupitia makazi yao. Uchunguzi mwingi hufanyika wakati sauti yao laini inasikika, au kwa kukimbia wakati imejaa kutoka kwa mnene. Wanaume na wanawake ni sawa katika kuchorea na dhamana kama jozi za maisha ambazo zinachukua eneo linalozingatia tovuti yao ya viota na kufungia. Spishi hiyo inachukua niche sawa ya kiikolojia kwa "Stagonopleura Bella" nzuri inayopatikana mashariki mwa Australia, ingawa tofauti na spishi zingine za jenasi mara kwa mara huweka pamoja na karibu hawajawahi kuonekana kwenye kundi kubwa.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Chicago Central Area Transit Plan
Content: In the summer of 1974, the CUTD selected a Core Plan, the initial portion of the Chicago Central Area Transit Project to be built. It consisted essentially of the Monroe Line, the Franklin Line, and a portion of the Randolph Line. The Core Plan, which would take about six years to complete and cost $1 billion based on an August 1973 cost estimate, was submitted to the Federal government on August 21, 1974. The Core Plan was received well, however, it was recommended that the project be reduced to $700 million. Modifications to the original Core Plan were made and the revised Plan was presented to UMTA in September 1974.

Title: Gulf of Tonkin

Title: Operesheni 34A
Content: Asubuhi ya 2 Agosti 1964, asubuhi baada ya Oplan Commandos kuvamia transmiter ya redio ya Vietnamese ya Kaskazini iliyoko kwenye kisiwa cha pwani, mmoja wa waangamizi hawa, USS "Maddox", iliripotiwa kuwa ilishambuliwa na Boti za Patrol za DRV huko Ghuba ya Tonkin. Kulikuwa na shambulio la pili lililodaiwa mnamo Agosti 4, ambalo baadaye lilionyeshwa kuwa uwongo. Mashambulio haya, na vitendo vya majini vilivyofuata, vinavyojulikana kama Ghuba ya Tonkin, vilikamatwa na Rais Lyndon Johnson kupata kifungu na Bunge la Merika la Azimio la Asia ya Kusini (inayojulikana kama Ghuba ya Azimio la Tonkin) mnamo 7 Agosti 1964, na kusababisha kuongezeka kwa nguvu ya Vita ya Vietnam. Imekuwa ikidaiwa kuwa tukio la Ghuba ya Tonkin lilikuwa sehemu ya uwongo, pamoja na ushuhuda wa washiriki, kama vile Kamanda wa Kikosi James Stockdale, katika hafla zenyewe. Hata mashambulio ambayo hayakutokea hayakuwa yamepunguzwa, lakini matokeo ya shambulio la Oplan 34A, ambalo kwa kweli lilikuwa operesheni ya Amerika.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: American Diabetes Association
Content: The ADA was founded in 1940 by six leading physicians − including Dr. Herman O. Mosenthal, Dr. Joseph T. Beardwood Jr., Dr. Joseph H. Barack, and Dr. E. S. Dillion − at their 1939 meeting of The American College of Physicians. In September 1946, they hosted a meeting in Toronto, Canada to celebrate the twenty-fifth anniversary of the discovery of insulin. The meeting served as a successful forum for hundreds of physicians and leading figures interested in the studies of diabetes and carbohydrate metabolism. The organization is now a national nonprofit with 40 affiliate organizations, more than 800 individual chapters, over a million volunteers, and almost 1,000 staff members − including officer and a board of directors.
---

Mnamo mwaka wa 2016 kufuatia kuunganishwa na Sheria ya ugonjwa wa kisukari shirika hilo lilijulikana kama ugonjwa wa kisukari NSW & ACT - Kikosi cha Watumiaji wa Kisukari huko New South Wales na ACT.
