prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Battle of Austerlitz
Content: The Battle of Austerlitz (2 December 1805/11 Frimaire An XIV FRC), also known as the Battle of the Three Emperors, was one of the most important and decisive engagements of the Napoleonic Wars. In what is widely regarded as the greatest victory achieved by Napoleon, the "Grande Armée" of France defeated a larger Russian and Austrian army led by Emperor Alexander I and Holy Roman Emperor Francis II. The battle occurred near the town of Austerlitz in the Austrian Empire (modern-day Slavkov u Brna in the Czech Republic). Austerlitz brought the War of the Third Coalition to a rapid end, with the Treaty of Pressburg signed by the Austrians later in the month. The battle is often cited as a tactical masterpiece, in the same league as other historic engagements like Cannae or Gaugamela.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: U.S. Route 17
Content: U.S. Route 17 or U.S. Highway 17 (abbreviation U.S. 17, US 17, also known as the Coastal Highway) is a north–south United States highway. The highway spans the southeastern United States and is close to the Atlantic Coast for much of its length. The highway's southern terminus is at Punta Gorda, Florida, at an intersection with US 41. Traveling north, US 17 joins up with US 50 in Paris, Virginia, and the northern terminus of US 17 is in downtown Winchester, Virginia. This is also the point at which the portion of US 50 called the Northwestern Turnpike begins.

Title: Njia maalum za Njia ya U.S. 17
Content: Marekebisho ya zamani ya Njia ya Amerika ya 17 kando ya Mfereji wa Swamp wa Dismal hubeba Uteuzi wa Biashara wa Njia ya Amerika ya Kaskazini kutoka kwa makutano ya Dominion Boulevard kwenda Deep Creek, ambapo biashara ya Amerika 17 inavuka mfereji kwenye droo ndogo, kabla ya kuendelea kaskazini kuungana tena na Njia ya Amerika ya 17 huko Interstate 64 (exit 296). Biashara ya Njia 17 ya Amerika kupitia Gloucester Courthouse ina kitanzi, Barabara kuu, ambayo inasafiri kupitia wilaya ya kihistoria ya kihistoria, ikiingiliana njia za serikali 3 na 14. VA 14 inazidisha na biashara ya Amerika 17 kwenye mguu wa kaskazini kurudi Amerika 17. Barabara kuu ni uwezekano wa upatanishi wa Amerika ya 17, kwa sababu ya Shields kadhaa za Amerika 17 juu ya kuwa na marufuku ya biashara. Biashara ya Njia ya 17 ya U.S. katika matawi ya Saluda mbali ya Mainline US 17 (Trail ya Tidewater) kaskazini mashariki mwa Gloucester Road pamoja na makubaliano na Jimbo la Virginia Njia ya 33. Sehemu moja baada ya Njia ya Sekondari ya Wye Virginia 618 kujiunga na njia mbili kutoka kwa makutano ya wapenzi wa kurudi nyuma. Katika makutano ya Barabara kuu ya Puller VA 33 inageuka kulia SSR 618 inaendelea kaskazini kuelekea Oakes Landing Road na basi za Amerika 17 zamu kushoto. Sehemu hii pia ina jina "Mtaa wa Shule," na inaendesha magharibi hadi kufikia mainline US 17 tena. Njia ya Biashara ya Merika 17 kupitia maeneo ya karibu na Fredericksburg, huanza kwenye makutano ya Amerika 17 na Jimbo la Virginia Route 2 kusini mashariki mwa Fredericksburg, ambapo wote wawili wanakuwa Trail ya Tidewater. Kutoka hapo barabara inapita na Fredericksburg Country Club, Uwanja wa Ndege wa Shannon na Fredericksburg Fairgrounds. Ndani ya mipaka ya jiji, Trail ya Tidewater inakuwa Dixon Street na inavuka chini ya njia ya bluu na kijivu Parkway, kisha inaendelea kabla ya kugawanyika kuelekea kusini mwa barabara ya Anne Street na Mtaa wa Northbound Caroline. Mitaa yote miwili inavuka chini ya Fredericksburg (kituo cha VRE), ambapo basi 1 ya Amerika inajiunga na basi 17 kando ya barabara zile zile za njia moja, hadi watakapofika Herndon Street na kuwa barabara ya njia mbili tena katika Princess Anne Street. Basi la Amerika 1 & 17 linaendelea Kuendesha kaskazini magharibi hadi watakapofika sisi 1 ambapo basi la Amerika 1 linaisha, lakini basi la Amerika 17 linajiunga na kuvuka Mto wa Rappahannock, na kuingia Falmouth. Basi la Amerika 17 linatuacha 1 mwisho wa magharibi wa Jimbo la Virginia 218 ambapo inaendesha kaskazini magharibi kuelekea Barabara ya Warrenton kabla ya kumaliza mwisho wa kaskazini wa I-95/US 17 Multiplex huko Exit 133-B. Njia ya Biashara ya Merika 17 huko Warrenton, Virginia pia inazidishwa na Njia ya Biashara ya U.S. na Njia ya Biashara ya U.S. 29, angalau mwisho wa kusini. Baada ya barabara kuu ya James Madison kuwa Shirley Avenue, basi la Amerika 15 linaacha makubaliano haya katika Mtaa wa Falmouth. Njia ya U.S. 211 inajiunga na njia mbili za biashara kama njia ya basi ya Amerika 211 inaendesha mashariki kando na Mtaa wa Waterloo na Amerika-211-bus 17/29 kuwa Broadview Avenue. Kama njia ya tatu inazunguka kulia, na inaingiliana na barabara ya Roebling, inakuwa Lee Highway, na US Basi 17 hufanya zamu ya kushoto kuelekea Broadview Avenue, jina litaweka hadi makutano ya barabara ya Foxcroft na kuwa James Madison Highway kabla ya kumalizia kwa njia ya marsh. 55 (Barabara ya Jimbo la Bure, West Main Street), kisha inageuka kusini mashariki mwa barabara ya Winchester wakati inaungana tena na Amerika 17 huko Exit 28 kwenye I-66.

Information: Document ID: 1
Title: U.S. Route 17
Content: U.S. Route 17 or U.S. Highway 17 (abbreviation U.S. 17, US 17, also known as the Coastal Highway) is a north–south United States highway. The highway spans the southeastern United States and is close to the Atlantic Coast for much of its length. The highway's southern terminus is at Punta Gorda, Florida, at an intersection with US 41. Traveling north, US 17 joins up with US 50 in Paris, Virginia, and the northern terminus of US 17 is in downtown Winchester, Virginia. This is also the point at which the portion of US 50 called the Northwestern Turnpike begins.

Title: Njia maalum za Njia ya U.S. 17
Content: Marekebisho ya zamani ya Njia ya Amerika ya 17 kando ya Mfereji wa Swamp wa Dismal hubeba Uteuzi wa Biashara wa Njia ya Amerika ya Kaskazini kutoka kwa makutano ya Dominion Boulevard kwenda Deep Creek, ambapo biashara ya Amerika 17 inavuka mfereji kwenye droo ndogo, kabla ya kuendelea kaskazini kuungana tena na Njia ya Amerika ya 17 huko Interstate 64 (exit 296). Biashara ya Njia 17 ya Amerika kupitia Gloucester Courthouse ina kitanzi, Barabara kuu, ambayo inasafiri kupitia wilaya ya kihistoria ya kihistoria, ikiingiliana njia za serikali 3 na 14. VA 14 inazidisha na biashara ya Amerika 17 kwenye mguu wa kaskazini kurudi Amerika 17. Barabara kuu ni uwezekano wa upatanishi wa Amerika ya 17, kwa sababu ya Shields kadhaa za Amerika 17 juu ya kuwa na marufuku ya biashara. Biashara ya Njia ya 17 ya U.S. katika matawi ya Saluda mbali ya Mainline US 17 (Trail ya Tidewater) kaskazini mashariki mwa Gloucester Road pamoja na makubaliano na Jimbo la Virginia Njia ya 33. Sehemu moja baada ya Njia ya Sekondari ya Wye Virginia 618 kujiunga na njia mbili kutoka kwa makutano ya wapenzi wa kurudi nyuma. Katika makutano ya Barabara kuu ya Puller VA 33 inageuka kulia SSR 618 inaendelea kaskazini kuelekea Oakes Landing Road na basi za Amerika 17 zamu kushoto. Sehemu hii pia ina jina "Mtaa wa Shule," na inaendesha magharibi hadi kufikia mainline US 17 tena. Njia ya Biashara ya Merika 17 kupitia maeneo ya karibu na Fredericksburg, huanza kwenye makutano ya Amerika 17 na Jimbo la Virginia Route 2 kusini mashariki mwa Fredericksburg, ambapo wote wawili wanakuwa Trail ya Tidewater. Kutoka hapo barabara inapita na Fredericksburg Country Club, Uwanja wa Ndege wa Shannon na Fredericksburg Fairgrounds. Ndani ya mipaka ya jiji, Trail ya Tidewater inakuwa Dixon Street na inavuka chini ya njia ya bluu na kijivu Parkway, kisha inaendelea kabla ya kugawanyika kuelekea kusini mwa barabara ya Anne Street na Mtaa wa Northbound Caroline. Mitaa yote miwili inavuka chini ya Fredericksburg (kituo cha VRE), ambapo basi 1 ya Amerika inajiunga na basi 17 kando ya barabara zile zile za njia moja, hadi watakapofika Herndon Street na kuwa barabara ya njia mbili tena katika Princess Anne Street. Basi la Amerika 1 & 17 linaendelea Kuendesha kaskazini magharibi hadi watakapofika sisi 1 ambapo basi la Amerika 1 linaisha, lakini basi la Amerika 17 linajiunga na kuvuka Mto wa Rappahannock, na kuingia Falmouth. Basi la Amerika 17 linatuacha 1 mwisho wa magharibi wa Jimbo la Virginia 218 ambapo inaendesha kaskazini magharibi kuelekea Barabara ya Warrenton kabla ya kumaliza mwisho wa kaskazini wa I-95/US 17 Multiplex huko Exit 133-B. Njia ya Biashara ya Merika 17 huko Warrenton, Virginia pia inazidishwa na Njia ya Biashara ya U.S. na Njia ya Biashara ya U.S. 29, angalau mwisho wa kusini. Baada ya barabara kuu ya James Madison kuwa Shirley Avenue, basi la Amerika 15 linaacha makubaliano haya katika Mtaa wa Falmouth. Njia ya U.S. 211 inajiunga na njia mbili za biashara kama njia ya basi ya Amerika 211 inaendesha mashariki kando na Mtaa wa Waterloo na Amerika-211-bus 17/29 kuwa Broadview Avenue. Kama njia ya tatu inazunguka kulia, na inaingiliana na barabara ya Roebling, inakuwa Lee Highway, na US Basi 17 hufanya zamu ya kushoto kuelekea Broadview Avenue, jina litaweka hadi makutano ya barabara ya Foxcroft na kuwa James Madison Highway kabla ya kumalizia kwa njia ya marsh. 55 (Barabara ya Jimbo la Bure, West Main Street), kisha inageuka kusini mashariki mwa barabara ya Winchester wakati inaungana tena na Amerika 17 huko Exit 28 kwenye I-66.
